title: When does the mystery skin bonus chance for legendary/esports skins reset?
body: On the official league pages it states self mystery items are not available until Oct 4, but that the special bonus chance you get to mystery gift a legendary or esports skin is reset at each stage of worlds. As far as I can see the first group stage game is on Oct 5. Does that mean there is a less than 24 hour window to self mystery gift with the current triple bonus that is active from the pentakill and baron steal during play in stage games?

replies.body: I believe these stages are based on the sections of Worlds. For instance, we're in the [**Play in Groups stage**](http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/worlds/world_championship_2017/schedule/play_in_groups/Day%202) which should last until Sept 26. After that, the multiplier should reset.
